TopicTitle: Warp to Ap etc missing from game

Articles.Content:
The warp to ap peri maneuver SOI arrows are not appearing in the game.

1.0.3.0 via Steam
Hi stratvox, can you check the support stickies and upload your game logs and affected save to dropbox please, I am unable to reproduce this issue here.

> 
> Hi stratvox, can you check the support stickies and upload your game logs and affected save to dropbox please, I am unable to reproduce this issue here.

That'll have to wait a few hours; I'm doing that gainful employment thing. There is no affected save in particular; I moved my career game off to the side and have been testing with a fresh install.

I'm going to check out that other thing with starting from within the game folder when I get home. If that works, that might indicate that there's a missing "./" from the beginning of the lib callouts... I'll work around it with a shell script if it turns out that works.

Cheers

Hey, see my post in the other thread. TL;DR: 1.0.4 plus starting in game folder fixes everything. I'm creating a shell script.

Cheers!
